title: Emily Ratajkowski shows off ripped abs in skimpy black cropped top and midi skirt while out in NYC
text:
She's a supermodel and outspoken businesswoman with her own swimwear line, married to a film producer with a high-profile movie coming out.

Emily Ratajkowski was seen Thursday night arriving at the 57th New York Film Festival at Lincoln Center on Manhattan's Upper West Side in New York City, in support of her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard's new film Uncut Gems.

Ratajkowski, 28, was gorgeous as usual in a chic and revealing all-black ensemble, including a one-shouldered black crop top that paraded her toned abs, ribs and bare collarbone.

Sexy siren: Emily Ratajkowski was seen Thursday night arriving at the 57th New York Film Festival at Lincoln Center in New York City, in support of her husband's new film Uncut Gems

The Inamorata Woman entrepreneur paired the top with a satiny black midi skirt, secured at the waist with a leather belt and large buckle.

To complete the look, Emily wore calf-high reptile skin black pointy boots with heels.

Her straight brown hair was down, and she sported a simple makeup look, with a slightly glossy nude-ish lip.

As always, she exuded an air of sexy, nonchalant confidence.

Show a shoulder: Ratajkowski was gorgeous as usual in a revealing all-black ensemble, with a one-shouldered black crop top that paraded her toned abs, ribs and bare collarbone

Uncut Gems is being co-produced by Emily's husband of one year Sebastian, along with Oscar Boyson, Eli Bush and Michael Bartol.

Hollywood heavyweights Scott Rudin and Martin Scorsese are also involved, as are many others.

The film stars Adam Sandler as a New York City jeweler who enters into a high stakes bet he might not be able to handle.

She's a head turner and she knows it: To complete the look, Emily wore calf-high reptile skin black pointy boots with heels

The film also stars Idina Menzel, The Weeknd and LaKeith Stanfield.

Earlier this week, Ratajkowski was hard at work as a model, doing a photoshoot in the city for Beats By Dre.

On the shoot, she sported a similarly chic but somewhat toned-down and covered-up ensemble, in a beige trench-style blazer, skintight black denim, and the same boots she was seen wearing on Thursday.

On the go: EmRata's straight brown hair was down, and she sported a simple makeup look, with a slightly glossy nude-ish lip
description: She's a supermodel and outspoken businesswoman with her own swimwear line, married to a film producer with a high-profile movie coming out.
